TEXT.TITLE: PACKAGING SYSTEMS <PAKS> TO BUY LABEL FIRM
TEXT.BODY: Packaging Systems Corp said it agreed to acquire <Walter-Richter Labels Inc>, a privately held maker of woven labels based in Paterson, N.J. Terms of the acquisition, which is expected to be completed within 60 days, were not disclosed. Reuter
